definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Ex 1:11 (J), = [[רַלְמְסֵס]] Ge 47:11, Ex 12:37, Nu 33:3, Nu 33:5 (all P), Ramses, city in Egypt; Rames(s)h; built by King Rameses II (hence its name; the king used Israelitish corveve acc. to Ex 1:11), near Tel el-Maskhuta (Pithom), but not certainly identified, v. [[פִּהׂם]] and reff.; ´[[אֶרֶץ ר]]: Ge 47:11 of district round.
